articles.description: The Deputy Chief Medical Officer confirmed that Australia has now completed over 1 million coronavirus tests since the pandemic hit.

articles.title: Coronavirus: A third of hospital patients develop dangerous blood clots - BBC News
articles.description: The virus appears to be making people's blood much more sticky, medical experts say.
articles.content:
Image copyrightBrian McClure Image caption
 Brian McClure was admitted to hospital with pneumonia as a result of Covid-19
Up to 30% of patients who are seriously ill with coronavirus are developing dangerous blood clots, according to medical experts.

articles.title: Comparing deaths caused by the flu, coronavirus in 2020 - KREM 2 News
articles.description: So far, the coronavirus has killed more people in Washington and the United States as a whole, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

articles.title: How much would a COVID-19 treatment cost? Feds look at addressing costs - WXYZ-TV Detroit | Channel 7
articles.description: There's concern among COVID-19 patients and their families about how much getting treatment could cost. With at least one drug showing promise, we wanted to ...
articles.content: There's concern among COVID-19 patients and their families about how much getting treatment could cost. With at least one drug showing promise, we wanted to show you what you or your insurance company might be asked to pay.
